description: Pushpa Lakmali Vs. Urban Development Authority and Another before Hon.K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
parties: Pushpa Lakmali Vs. Urban Development Authority and Another
keywords: Appeal from an Order of a Provincial High Court-Unauthorized construction-Defence available to an application under Section 28A(3) of the UDA Act as amended.
legistation: Articles 138 of the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka, section 28A(3) of the Urban Development Authority Act No. 41 of 1978 as amended.
